snippet: U.S. Open champion Stan Wawrinka took a step closer to a second straight title Friday as he advanced to the semifinals of the St. Petersburg Open....
lead_paragraph: U.S. Open champion Stan Wawrinka took a step closer to a second straight title Friday as he advanced to the semifinals of the St. Petersburg Open.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka, Berdych Into St. Petersburg Semifinals
headline.main: Wawrinka, Berdych Into St. Petersburg Semifinals
